co.cask.cdap.api.app

Interface ApplicationSpecification


  • public interface ApplicationSpecification
    Application Specification used in core code.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns:
        Name of the Application.

      • getConfiguration

        @Nullable
String getConfiguration()
        Returns:
        Configuration string used during the creation of the Application.

      • getDescription

        String getDescription()
        Returns:
        Description of the Application.

      • getArtifactId

        ArtifactId getArtifactId()
        Returns:
        ID of the artifact used to create the application.

      • getStreams

        Map<String,StreamSpecification> getStreams()
        Returns:
        An immutable Map from Stream name to StreamSpecification for Streams configured for the Application.

      • getDatasetModules

        Map<String,String> getDatasetModules()
        Returns:
        An immutable Map from DatasetModule name to DatasetModule class name for dataset modules configured for the Application.

      • getDatasets

        Map<String,co.cask.cdap.internal.dataset.DatasetCreationSpec> getDatasets()
        Returns:
        An immutable Map from Dataset name to DatasetCreationSpec for Datasets configured for the Application.

      • getFlows

        Map<String,FlowSpecification> getFlows()
        Returns:
        An immutable Map from Flow name to FlowSpecification for Flows configured for the Application.

      • getMapReduce

        Map<String,MapReduceSpecification> getMapReduce()
        Returns:
        An immutable Map from MapReduce name to MapReduceSpecification for MapReduce jobs configured for the Application.

      • getSpark

        Map<String,SparkSpecification> getSpark()
        Returns:
        An immutable Map from Spark name to SparkSpecification for Spark jobs configured for the Application.

      • getWorkflows

        Map<String,WorkflowSpecification> getWorkflows()
        Returns:
        An immutable Map from Workflow name to WorkflowSpecification for Workflows configured for the Application.

      • getServices

        Map<String,ServiceSpecification> getServices()
        Returns:
        An immutable Map from service name to ServiceSpecification for services configured for the Application.

      • getWorkers

        Map<String,WorkerSpecification> getWorkers()
        Returns:
        An immutable Map from worker name to WorkerSpecification for workers configured for the Application.

      • getSchedules

        Map<String,ScheduleSpecification> getSchedules()
        Returns:
        An immutable Map from Schedule name to ScheduleSpecification

      • getPlugins

        Map<String,Plugin> getPlugins()
        Returns:
        An immutable Map from plugin id to Plugin
